r.s: Trace is a low-overhead tracing tool for PHP
r.d: Trace is a low-overhead tracing tool for PHP. It can trace all PHP executing, function calls, request information during run-time. And provides features like Filter, Statistics, Current Status and so on. It is very useful to locate blocking, heavy-load problems and debug in all environments, especially in production environments.
r.n: - Add support for PHP 7.1 - Fix problem with arguments passed by-reference #77 - Fix some unit tests
